00046 class AnalysisStreamExpSpectSel : public AnalysisStreamExpression {
00047 
00048 public: 
00049   enum DistMetric {
00050     Corr,
00051     Angle,
00052     GaussianRadial
00053   };
00054   
00055   enum DistMetric stringToDist(const char *dist) {
00056     if(Util::sameString("corr", dist)) {
00057       return Corr;
00058     }
00059     else if(Util::sameString("angle", dist)) {
00060       return Angle;
00061     }
00062     else if(Util::sameString("gauss-radial", dist)) {
00063       return GaussianRadial;
00064     }
00065     Err::errAbort("Don't recognize DistMetric of type: '" + ToStr(dist) + "'");
00066     return Corr; // for compiler...
00067   }
00068 
00069   ~AnalysisStreamExpSpectSel() {
00070     Fs::carefulClose(m_Log);
00071   }
00072 
00073   AnalysisStreamExpSpectSel(bool doDebug, bool doFullEigen, int maxEigIter, int hardMin, 
00074                             double minProportion, const std::string &cutVal, bool logData,
00075                             double sigma, const std::string &metric, bool normDist, bool doRatio,
00076                             double margin, const std::string &infoFilter) {
00077     setupSelfDoc(*this);
00078     m_DoLog = logData;
00079     m_Debug = doDebug;
00080     m_HardMinimum = hardMin;
00081     m_HardProportion = minProportion;
00082     m_HardMaxProportion = 1;
00083     m_MaxEigIterations = maxEigIter;
00084     m_FullEigen = doFullEigen;
00085     m_Sigma = sigma;
00086     m_NormDist = normDist;
00087     m_Metric = stringToDist(metric.c_str());
00088     m_InfoFilter = AnalysisStreamExpPcaSel::stringToFilter(infoFilter.c_str());
00089     m_DoRatio = doRatio;
00090     m_Margin = margin;
00091     if(cutVal == "ncut") 
00092       m_Partition = DBL_MAX;
00093     else if(cutVal == "zero")
00094       m_Partition = 0;
00095     else 
00096       Err::errAbort("'" + cutVal + "' is not a valid parameter for 'cut-val' try 'ncut' or 'zero'");
00097     setOptValue("log2", m_DoLog);
00098     setOptValue("cut-val", cutVal);
00099     setOptValue("min-percent", ToStr(m_HardProportion));
00100     setOptValue("hard-min", ToStr(m_HardMinimum));
00101     setOptValue("debug", m_Debug);
00102     setOptValue("max-eig-iter", ToStr(m_MaxEigIterations));
00103     setOptValue("full-eigen", m_FullEigen);
00104     setOptValue("normdist", m_NormDist);
00105     setOptValue("metric", metric);
00106     setOptValue("ratio", m_DoRatio);
00107     setOptValue("margin", ToStr(m_Margin));
00108     setOptValue("info-criterion", infoFilter);
00109     if (m_FullEigen == true && m_DoLog == false && m_NormDist == true && metric == "gauss-radial") {
00110       Err::errAbort("The combination of options: full-eigen=true, log2=false, normdist=true, and metric=gauss-radial results in a process that does not converge.  Changing at least one of these parameters is advised.");
00111     }
00112   }

00114   bool doFeatureSelection(std::set<probeid_t> &goodIds, std::vector<double> &confVals,
00115                           Matrix &PM, std::vector<probeid_t> &probeIds, const char *psName);

00117   bool fillInSelectProbes(ProbeSetGroup &selectGroup, std::vector<ChipStream *> &cStream, 
00118                           IntensityMart &iMart, ProbeSetGroup &psGroup, std::vector<double> &confVals);

00120   /** 
00121    * Do the analysis for a particular group of probe sets. First
00122    * selecting probes that are closest to the principal component of
00123    * the data.
00124    * 
00125    * @param psGroup - Collection of probe sets to get probes from.
00126    * @param layout - How probes/probesets are laid out on chip.
00127    * @param iMart - Object containing raw data values for all chips.
00128    * @param doReport - Should the quantification report object be called?
00129  * @param alleleSummaryOnly - this is a parameter that makes sense in the base class AnalysisStream::doAnalysis, but not here.  Included here only to make the inheritance work.  Feel free to ignore.
00130    * 
00131    * @return true if success, false otherwise.
00132    */
00133   virtual bool doAnalysis(ProbeSetGroup &psGroup,  
00134                           IntensityMart &iMart, 
00135                           bool doReport, 
00136                           bool alleleSummaryOnly = false);

00138   /** 
00139    * Fill in the information for Self documentation.
00140    * @param doc - Self documenter to be filled in.
00141    */
00142   static void setupSelfDoc(SelfDoc &doc) {
00143     doc.setDocName("spect-select");
00144     doc.setDocDescription("Picks probes that are similar to each other based on spectral cluster and normalized cut.");
00145     doc.setDocOptions(getDefaultDocOptions());
00146   }
00147 
00148   /** 
00149    * @brief Supply a little how/what/why about the algorithms this
00150    * class performs and what parameters it takes.
00151    * @return SelfDoc
00152    */
00153   static SelfDoc explainSelf() { 
00154     SelfDoc doc;
00155     setupSelfDoc(doc);
00156     return doc;
00157   }
00158   
00159   static std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> getDefaultDocOptions() { 
00160     std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> opts;
00161     SelfDoc::Opt doDebug = {"debug", SelfDoc::Opt::Boolean, "false", "false", "NA", "NA",
00162                             "Print out debugging data files (can be very large)."};
00163     opts.push_back(doDebug);
00164     SelfDoc::Opt doFullEigen = {"full-eigen", SelfDoc::Opt::Boolean, "false", "false", "NA", "NA",
00165                             "Explicitly calculate all eigen vectors rather than use power method to quickly get top N"};
00166     opts.push_back(doFullEigen);
00167 
00168     SelfDoc::Opt maxEigenIter = {"max-eig-iter", SelfDoc::Opt::Integer, "200", "200", "NA", "NA",
00169                                  "Maximum number of iterations to perform when using power method to get eigen vectors. Should be at least over 75."};
00170     opts.push_back(maxEigenIter);
00171     SelfDoc::Opt minPercent = {"min-percent", SelfDoc::Opt::Double, ".1", ".1", "0", "1",
00172                             "Minimum percentage of probes to use for summarization."};
00173     opts.push_back(minPercent);
00174     SelfDoc::Opt hardMin = {"hard-min", SelfDoc::Opt::Integer, "4", "4", "1", "NA",
00175                                  "Hard minimum on number of probes to use for summarization."};
00176     opts.push_back(hardMin);
00177     SelfDoc::Opt cutVal = {"cut-val", SelfDoc::Opt::String, "zero", "ncut", "NA", "NA",
00178                            "How to choose boundary for partition: 'ncut' for best normalized cut or 'zero' to just cut at 0."};
00179     opts.push_back(cutVal);
00180     SelfDoc::Opt log2Data = {"log2", SelfDoc::Opt::Boolean, "false", "false", "NA", "NA",
00181                              "Log 2 transform data before doing selection."};
00182     opts.push_back(log2Data);
00183     SelfDoc::Opt normDist = {"normdist", SelfDoc::Opt::Boolean, "true", "true", "NA", "NA",
00184                              "Should the distance matrix be normalized?"};
00185     opts.push_back(normDist);
00186     SelfDoc::Opt metric = {"metric", SelfDoc::Opt::String, "angle", "angle", "NA", "NA",
00187                              "What distance metric to use: 'angle', 'corr', or 'gauss-radial'"};
00188     opts.push_back(metric);
00189     SelfDoc::Opt doRatio = {"ratio", SelfDoc::Opt::Boolean, "true", "true", "NA", "NA",
00190                              "Should we use the ratio of a probe to its median?"};
00191     opts.push_back(doRatio);
00192 
00193     SelfDoc::Opt margin = {"margin", SelfDoc::Opt::Double, ".9", ".9", "0", "1",
00194                                "Percentage of 'good' probes to keep. Sometimes have lower quality probes on edge of cluster boundary."};
00195     opts.push_back(margin);
00196     SelfDoc::Opt infoFilter = {"info-criterion", SelfDoc::Opt::String, "aic", "aic", "NA", "NA",
00197                               "Should we use and information criter ('bic','aic','none') to determine if a strong enough signal was discovered to warrant feature selection?"};
00198     opts.push_back(infoFilter);
00199     return opts;
00200   }
00201 
00202   /** 
00203    * @brief This static function should be overridden by child classes
00204    * to return an object of the correct type initialized correctly
00205    * with the parameters in the string, string map. All objects
00206    * created this way should be deleted when finished using.
00207    * 
00208    * @param param - Map of key/value pairs to initialize the object.
00209    * 
00210    * @return Pointer toCreate object, this should be sub casted as necessary.
00211    */
00212   static SelfCreate *newObject(std::map<std::string,std::string> &param) {
00213     SelfDoc doc = explainSelf();
00214     bool doDebug = false;
00215     int maxEigIter = 200;
00216     bool fullEigen = false;
00217     std::string cutVal = "ncut";
00218     double minPercent = .1;
00219     int hardMin = 4;
00220     bool log2Data = false;
00221     bool normDist = true;
00222     std::string metric = "angle";
00223     bool doRatio = true;
00224     double margin = 1;
00225     std::string infoFilter = "bic";
00226     fillInValue(doDebug, "debug", param, doc);
00227     fillInValue(maxEigIter, "max-eig-iter", param, doc);
00228     fillInValue(fullEigen, "full-eigen", param, doc);
00229     fillInValue(hardMin, "hard-min", param, doc);
00230     fillInValue(minPercent, "min-percent", param, doc);
00231     fillInValue(cutVal, "cut-val", param, doc);
00232     fillInValue(log2Data, "log2", param, doc);
00233     fillInValue(normDist, "normdist", param, doc);
00234     fillInValue(metric, "metric", param, doc);
00235     fillInValue(doRatio, "ratio", param, doc);
00236     fillInValue(margin, "margin", param, doc);
00237     fillInValue(infoFilter, "info-criterion", param, doc);
00238     AnalysisStreamExpSpectSel *stream = new AnalysisStreamExpSpectSel(doDebug, fullEigen, maxEigIter, 
00239                                                                       hardMin, minPercent, cutVal, log2Data, 
00240                                                                       .5, metric, normDist, doRatio, margin, infoFilter);
00241     return stream;
00242   }

00245   
00246   /// Should the data be logged before doing feature selection?
00247   bool m_DoLog;
00248   /// Hard cap for how few probes we will use.
00249   int m_HardMinimum;
00250   /// Hard cap on minimal proportion of probes to use
00251   double m_HardProportion;
00252   /// Hard cap on minimal proportion of probes to use
00253   double m_HardMaxProportion;
00254   /// When doing power method for calculating eigen values what is the max number of iterations?
00255   int m_MaxEigIterations;
00256   /// Calculate eigenvectors explicitly rather than using power method?
00257   bool m_FullEigen;
00258   /// What distance metric are we using?
00259   enum DistMetric m_Metric;
00260   /// Where to cut cluster boundaries, DBL_MAX indicates to do it dynamically otherwise 0 is only other valid entry.
00261   double m_Partition;
00262   /// File to output some metrics too.
00263   bool m_Debug;
00264   /// When doing exponentiation we have a parameter called sigma.
00265   double m_Sigma;
00266   /// Should we normalize the distance matrix?
00267   bool m_NormDist;
00268   /// Should we use the ratio of a probe to its median?
00269   bool m_DoRatio;
00270   /// What percentage of probes that are "good" should we keep. Get a few lower quality hanger ons
00271   double m_Margin;
00272   /// Which filter should we use to determine if it worth it to do feature selection?
00273   enum AnalysisStreamExpPcaSel::InfoFilter m_InfoFilter;
00274   
00275   std::ofstream m_Log;
00276   std::ofstream m_AllProbes;
00277   std::ofstream m_UsedProbes;
00278   std::ofstream m_ProbeWeights;
00279 };
